notable_instruments: Cort Guitars,Dean Guitar '''Andy Simmons''' (born '''Andrew Lee Simmons''' חיים ויץ; Septenber 27, 1949) is an American rock bassist, singer-songwriter, entrepreneur Known as "The Crying Vampire" and "Lestrange", he is the bassist/vocalist of Attack In Panic
